sn48.30:4.1: “Mendicants, there are ascetics and brahmins who don’t understand the eye faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn48.30:4.2: They don’t understand the ear faculty …
sn48.30:4.6: mind faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn48.30:4.7: I don’t consider them to be true ascetics and brahmins. Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and don’t live having achieved it with their own insight.
sn48.30:5.1: There are ascetics and brahmins who do understand the eye faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation. They understand the ear faculty …
sn48.30:5.5: mind faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation. I consider them to be true ascetics and brahmins. Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having achieved it with their own insight.”
